sqlMap.select: select LV_ID, EMP_ID, LV_TITLE, PHONE_NO, LV_TYPE, LV_REASON, LV_START, LV_DAYS, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_TIME from T_APPLY_LEAVE where LV_ID = #lvId:DECIMAL#

select LV_ID, EMP_ID, LV_TITLE, PHONE_NO, LV_TYPE, LV_REASON, LV_START, LV_DAYS, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_TIME from T_APPLY_LEAVE
order by $orderByClause$

select LV_ID, EMP_ID, LV_TITLE, PHONE_NO, LV_TYPE, LV_REASON, LV_START, LV_DAYS, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_TIME from T_APPLY_LEAVE where rownum<2
LV_ID = #lvId:DECIMAL#
EMP_ID = #empId:DECIMAL#
LV_TITLE = #lvTitle:VARCHAR#
PHONE_NO = #phoneNo:VARCHAR#
LV_TYPE = #lvType:VARCHAR#
LV_REASON = #lvReason:VARCHAR#
LV_START = #lvStart:VARCHAR#
LV_END = #lvEnd:VARCHAR#
CREATE_DATE = #createDate:VARCHAR#
CREATE_TIME = #createTime:VARCHAR#

select LV_ID, EMP_ID, LV_TITLE, PHONE_NO, LV_TYPE, LV_REASON, LV_START, LV_DAYS, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_TIME from T_APPLY_LEAVE
LV_ID = #lvId:DECIMAL#
EMP_ID = #empId:DECIMAL#
LV_TITLE = #lvTitle:VARCHAR#
PHONE_NO = #phoneNo:VARCHAR#
LV_TYPE = #lvType:VARCHAR#
LV_REASON = #lvReason:VARCHAR#
LV_START = #lvStart:VARCHAR#
LV_END = #lvEnd:VARCHAR#
CREATE_DATE = #createDate:VARCHAR#
CREATE_TIME = #createTime:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.delete:
delete from T_APPLY_LEAVE
LV_ID = #lvId:DECIMAL#
EMP_ID = #empId:DECIMAL#
LV_TITLE = #lvTitle:VARCHAR#
PHONE_NO = #phoneNo:VARCHAR#
LV_TYPE = #lvType:VARCHAR#
LV_REASON = #lvReason:VARCHAR#
LV_START = #lvStart:VARCHAR#
LV_END = #lvEnd:VARCHAR#
CREATE_DATE = #createDate:VARCHAR#
CREATE_TIME = #createTime:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SQ_T_APPLY_LEAVE_ID_1.NEXTVAL AS VALUE FROM DUAL
insert into T_APPLY_LEAVE (LV_ID, EMP_ID, FLOW_ID, LV_TITLE, PHONE_NO, LV_TYPE, LV_REASON, LV_START, LV_END, CREATE_DATE,CREATE_TIME, ORG_ID) values (#lvId:DECIMAL:-9999#, #empId:DECIMAL:-9999#, #flowId:VARCHAR#, #lvTitle:VARCHAR#, #phoneNo:VARCHAR#, #lvType:VARCHAR#, #lvReason:VARCHAR#, #lvStart:VARCHAR#, #lvEnd:VARCHAR#, #createDate:VARCHAR#,#createTime:VARCHAR#, #orgid:DECIMAL:-9999#)
sqlMap.select: select a.LV_ID lvID, a.EMP_ID empId, a.FLOW_ID flowId, e.EMPNAME, a.LV_TITLE lvTitle, a.PHONE_NO phoneNo, a.LV_TYPE lvType, a.LV_REASON lvReason, a.LV_START lvStart, a.LV_END lvEnd, a.ATIME from T_APPLY_LEAVE a,om_employee e where a.EMP_ID = e.EMPID

select a.LV_ID lvID, a.EMP_ID empId, a.FLOW_ID flowId, e.EMPNAME, a.LV_TITLE lvTitle, a.PHONE_NO phoneNo, a.LV_TYPE lvType, a.LV_REASON lvReason, a.LV_START lvStart, a.LV_END lvEnd a.LV_START lvStart, a.LV_END lvEnd, a.CREATE_DATE createDate, a.CREATE_TIME createTime from T_APPLY_LEAVE a,om_employee e where a.EMP_ID = e.EMPID and a.LV_TITLE like '%$title$%' and e.EMPNAME like '%$applicant$%' and a.lv_reason like '%$lv_reason$%'
and lv_type = #lv_type#

select a.LV_ID lvID, a.EMP_ID empId, a.ORG_ID orgid, a.FLOW_ID flowId, e.EMPNAME, a.LV_TITLE lvTitle, a.PHONE_NO phoneNo, a.LV_TYPE lvType, a.LV_REASON lvReason, a.LV_START lvStart, a.LV_END lvEnd, a.LV_START lvStart, a.LV_END lvEnd, a.CREATE_DATE createDate, a.CREATE_TIME createTime from T_APPLY_LEAVE a,om_employee e where a.EMP_ID = e.EMPID and a.LV_ID = #id#

select a.LV_ID lvID, a.EMP_ID empId, a.ORG_ID orgid, a.FLOW_ID flowId, e.EMPNAME, a.LV_TITLE lvTitle, a.PHONE_NO phoneNo, a.LV_TYPE lvType, a.LV_REASON lvReason, a.LV_START lvStart, a.LV_END lvEnd, a.LV_START lvStart, a.LV_END lvEnd, a.CREATE_DATE createDate, a.CREATE_TIME createTime from T_APPLY_LEAVE a,om_employee e where a.EMP_ID = e.EMPID and a.FLOW_ID = #executionId#
sqlMap.update:
update T_APPLY_LEAVE
EMP_ID = #empId:DECIMAL:-9999#
ORG_ID = #orgid:DECIMAL:-9999#
FLOW_ID = #flowId:VARCHAR#
LV_TITLE = #lvTitle:VARCHAR#
PHONE_NO = #phoneNo:VARCHAR#
LV_TYPE = #lvType:VARCHAR#
LV_REASON = #lvReason:VARCHAR#
LV_START = #lvStart:VARCHAR#
LV_END = #lvEnd:VARCHAR#
CREATE_DATE = #createDate:VARCHAR#
CREATE_TIME = #createTime:VARCHAR#
where LV_ID = #lvId#
